p: ZIKV RT-qPCR data, for experiments performed on RNA directly extracted and extracted after loading on RDT for ZIKV dilutions 10 −2–10 −8, are presented in Table 4. The LOD for RNA extraction from RDT was 10 −6, as compared with 10 −7 for direct virus extraction. For all dilutions (except for the one at the LOD), standard deviation (SD) of Cq from triplicate RDTs was ≤ 0.37; a similar result was observed for direct extraction with SD from 0.13 to 0.27 (excluding dilution at the LOD). This is indicative of good reproducibility of ZIKV RT-qPCR from RDTs.
